name: budgetbee
description: BudgetBee is a self-hosted and privacy-focused budgeting tool. It features income and expenses tracking, budget categories, monthly reports and a simple UI suited for individuals and families.
features: Budget Tracking: Monitor income and expenses with ease. Complete financial overview.
Category Management: Organize spending into customizable categories. Smart organization.
Monthly Reports: View detailed financial reports and trends. Understand your spending.
Privacy-Focused: Self-hosted solution keeps finances completely private. Your money, your data.
Simple Interface: Clean UI designed for individuals and families. Easy to use.
Expense Logging: Quick entry for daily transactions. Effortless tracking.
Budget Goals: Set and track financial goals and limits. Stay on target.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your financial data. Maximum privacy.
